item.description:
Sooo This month- is at Jeff's place! Yes again, he's given us a nice home to meet at- thank you Jeff!

The theme of the month? How about- Let's not have our MeetUp on Thanksgiving day?! Thanks Casey and Don for pointing that out!

Let's have a party around modifiers- light modifiers- camera modifiers - anything having to do playing in photography! An example would be a "Gary Fong" flash modifier. Really any 3rd party do-dad that modifies light from either a flash, strobe or sun. Or possibly a camera modifier such as a "lens baby" etc. I'll be bringing my own DIY beauty dish I made for my flash. You are welcome to bring anything you've created as well!

Bring it in and share...

See you there!
Donna and Scotty
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography November Meetup
